markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cat Nap](/Feats.aspx?ID=5543) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=746" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Exploration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=595" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 10 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Frequency**
once per hour

</column>

---

You can regain your energy quickly with a brief nap. You sleep for 10 minutes, after which you gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level that last for 1 hour.
name: Cat Nap
